channel.title: Blogdown R Rstudio on
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown R Rstudio on

item.title: How to setup a blogdown site in 3 minutes from scrach.
item.description: This site, big-data-scientist.de is written with blogdown. https://github.com/rstudio/blogdown. The package and the documentation are still under development (07.2017), but it works already great. I would like to contribute a quick-start tutorial, as i feel that could help some interested follower to get an overview. VIDEO. For a full tutorial see here: https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/.
